response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present this exceptional opportunity to you. The product I have to offer is truly unique and valuable, with an intrinsic worth exceeding $8,000 to me. Considering its quality and the benefits it provides, I am extending a special offer for you to acquire it at a price that reflects its true value. I kindly propose a purchase price of $12,000. This offer allows you to secure a premium item at a competitive rate, while also ensuring I receive a fair compensation for my investment and time spent on this product. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.", "product_price": 12000}
